column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.
Due to technical difficulties not all camera angles were available for the reporting of this race.
KAPAI STEWIE (1) - hampered early stages being obligated to check off the heels of PORTLAND ART.
CLEVER HARPER (7) - inconvenienced when racing to the inside of KAPAI CHRIS into the bend.
KAPAI CHRIS (8) - inconvenienced when racing to the inside of CLEVER HARPER into the bend.
JINJA LAD (5) - squeezed for racing room early stages.
ASSERTING POWER (7) - racing line impeded in the run to the bend being obliged to check off heels.
EL NARCO (8) - shifted down the track in the run to the bend placing inside runners in some difficulty.
GO FALCON (3) - placed in restricted room early stages.
BIG TIME RUSTY (4) - placed in restricted room early stages. Hampered for a stride when racing to the inside of NEXUS rounding the bend.
TALKABOUT IZZY (5) - hind quarters climbed on by NEXUS early stages. Lost momentum when awkwardly positioned between runners entering the bend.

NEXUS (6) - climbed on the hind quarters of TALKABOUT IZZY early stages. Checked outwards off heels rounding the bend before becoming awkwardly placed to the outside of BIG TIME RUSTY losing momentum.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Sparkle and Fade Syndicate
column7: Trained by: B D F Craik

column1: MEDUSA WHO (4) - hampered and bumped from the outside early stages. Collided with PLATINUM TEARS prior to the bend. Raced wide rounding the bend and through the run home.
TALKABOUT SOPHIE (5) - slow early before being squeezed for racing room between runners.
PLATINUM TEARS (6) - placed in restricted room early stages. Contacted from the inside by MEDUSA WHO prior to the bend.

column7: Trained by: J Udy & D Cottam

column1: PAT TAMA (1) - lost ground when placed in tight quarters entering the bend.
NOAH WHO (2) - slow early. Awkwardly placed on heels entering the bend having to check for a stride.
GRUNT (3) - collided with BUSY FLASH exiting the bend.
KEYSILE (5) - placed in tight quarters entering the bend losing ground. Raced wide through the run home.
BUSY FLASH (8) - collided with GRUNT exiting the bend.
ZIPPING BUDDY (1) - shouldered with THRILLING BRUCE prior to the bend losing momentum
THRILLING BRUCE (2) - awkwardly placed between runners entering the bend.
SPRING MECHANIC (5) - bumped from the outside before being placed in restricted room entering the bend losing ground.
CAPTAIN KEV (6) - jostled with TYPICAL in the run to the bend before bumping with SPRING MECHANIC.
TYPICAL (9/7) - jostled with CAPTAIN KEV in the run to the bend.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Chad Nathan & Yousif Korkis

column1: RELEVANCE (2) - Stewards queried the improved performance of this greyhound with co - trainer R Udy. Mr Udy advised the Stewards that he was of the opinion the greyhound had been having it's third start back from injury and with natural improvement from the races along with a favourable box draw today was able to have an unimpeded run in front.
SEE EYE BE (3) - checked from behind in the run to the bend.
MADAM BUCKS (4) - bumped briefly on several occasions in the run to the bend.
GAIN CAPITAL (7) - shifted down the track early stages hampering inside greyhounds. Checked inwards off heels when squeezed for racing room in the run to the bend.
ALWAYS DREAMING (1) - awkwardly positioned on heels entering the bend.
BIG TIME ROSE (2) - hampered rounding the bend losing ground. Referred to the Veterinarian where it was reported to have a right hip support injury and sore in its right fore dew claw.
OUR GREG (3) - dragged down rounding the bend losing ground. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
JINJA JAY (5) - forced down the track early stages.
FORD MAN (6) - forced down onto JINJA JAY early stages.
SNOOPY'S HERO (8) - shifted down the track early stages hampering inside runners.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Ferguson, O'Neill, Northcott, Hardaker & Three Logans Syndicate

column1: SPRING QUEEN (1) - hampered and turned inwards in the run to the bend.
CLARETOWN BEAU (2) - placed in tight quarters in the run to the bend. Awkwardly positioned on heels entering the bend having to check and lose momentum.
JINJA MURPHY (3) - jostled with SILENCI early stages.
SILENCI (4) - squeezed for room early stages jostling with JINJA MURPHY.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Sparkle and Fade Syndicate
column7: Trained by: B D F Craik

column1: MAGIC EIGHT BALL (4) - squeezed for racing room early stages. Awkwardly positioned on heels entering the bend losing ground.
JUST MADDIE (5) - squeezed for racing room early stages checking off heels.
HUA HUA (6) - squeezed for racing room early stages losing ground.
FALL GRACEFULLY (4) - bumped with JINJA JAKE early stages. Jostled briefly with JINJA JAKE in the run to the bend.
JINJA JAKE (5) - squeezed for racing room early stages. Jostled briefly with FALL GRACEFULLY in the run to the bend.
PEEKAY SHOUT (6) - bumped with JINJA JAKE early stages.
AMY AMY (7) - awkwardly positioned to the outside of FALL GRACEFULLY entering the bend falling to the track. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
PAM ARISING (3) - awkwardly placed between runners entering the bend losing ground and hampering ENJOY THE PERKS. Checked off heels rounding the bend.
ENJOY THE PERKS (6) - bumped JINJA NICE in the run to the bend. Hampered by PAM ARISING entering the bend.
JINJA NICE (7) - bumped from behind in the run to the bend.
NIGHT ACE (8) - weakened late in the run home. Precautionary Veterinarian revealed a left gracilis cramp and signs of the thumps.
The official website for Greyhound Racing New Zealand (GRNZ)
